skills.skill: Object Oriented JavaScript or modern JavaScript Frameworks
Automated Unit testing for both front end and back end
SQL Server, creating queries, views and stored procs

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain front-end and back-end applications using Angular 6+ or React, C#, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Implement Object Oriented JavaScript or modern JavaScript Frameworks for enhanced application functionality.
Utilize .NET Framework 4+ (and/or experience with .NET Core) for application development and enhancement.
Work with ASP.NET MVC and ASP.Net Web API to create scalable and efficient web applications.
Conduct Automated Unit testing for both front end and back end to ensure application stability and performance.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams in an agile environment to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Use Git for version control and code collaboration within the development team.
Utilize SQL Server for creating queries, views, and stored procedures to support application data management.
